greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1)=1; thereafter a(n+1) = a(n)-n if a(n) >= n otherwise a(n+1) = a(n)+n.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
maple: A008343 := proc(n) option remember; if n = 1 then 1 elif A008343(n-1) >= (n-1) then A008343(n-1)-(n-1) else A008343(n-1)+(n-1); fi; end;
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_ and _J. H. Conway_
